Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityViewProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultEntityFetchingViewProcessor, DelegatingEntityFetchingViewProcessor, EntityQueryFilterProcessor
public abstract class AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor extends SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
Adapter for EntityViewProcessor that fetches an Iterable of entity items and registers the result as attributeName.

Expects a Pageable extension to be present on the EntityViewCommand. This can be bound from the request by a PageableExtensionViewProcessor. The Pageable will be used for fetching the items, if it is not present no items will be fetched. Often a SortableTableRenderingViewProcessor will perform the actual rendering of the items.

Fetching the items happens in the doControl(EntityViewRequest, EntityView, EntityViewCommand) phase.

Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
See Also:
  • PageableExtensionViewProcessor
